name: God of Puzzle
blurb: A competitive puzzle game that takes classic gameplay to the next level with new features+online play for desktop and mobile platforms.

rewards.reward: Early Birds Special! Get 2 digital copies of the game so you can enjoy it with your friends and family! After all, the game is designed to be a multiplayer game. You can choose any version you want for each copy of the game (PC, Mac, iOS or Android). Also include your name in the credit under \u201cBackers\u201d section and access to beta test the game.

One digital copy of the game. You can pick any version (PC, Mac, iOS or Android). Your name in the credit under \u201cBackers\u201d section and access to beta test the game. Beta access at the lowest tier? Well, yes! Beta test would be kind of lame if people don't have access to it, right?

Get 3 digital copies of the game so you can enjoy it with your friends and family! After all, the game is designed to be a multiplayer game. You can choose any version you want for each copy of the game (PC, Mac, iOS or Android). Also include your name in the credit under \u201cBackers\u201d section and access to beta test the game.

The Family Pack! Get 5 digital copies of the game so you can enjoy it with your friends and family! After all, the game is designed to be a multiplayer game. You can choose any version you want for each copy of the game (PC, Mac, iOS or Android). Also include your name in the credit under \u201cBackers\u201d section and access to beta test the game.

Exclusive Digital Contents Pack! This includes: digital art book with sketches, concepts and production arts, two exclusive hi-res artworks suitable for large prints, and one 3D model of one of the game's characters, suitable for 3D printing. We'll even throw in a PC copy of Biology Battle! Also include the Family Pack rewards.

A limited physical-box edition exclusively for kickstarter! Content of the box will include the game disc with printed manual and the art book in its beautifully printed glory. We won\u2019t be making these box set anymore once this is over! Last but not least, your name in the credit under \u201cSpecial Thanks\u201d section, because we really want to thank you for your trust in us, and of course, for your generous backing! Shipping included. Also Includes lower tiers rewards down to the Family Pack.

A special \u201cmajor backer\u201d indicator for your user profile in the game. This is our way of showing how much we appreciate your huge support, and we want other players to see how awesome you are. Also Includes lower tiers rewards down to the Family Pack.

A limited edition printed artwork signed by the team. The paper will be high-quality poster paper at least the size of A1 paper (594x841mm). The artwork will be custom made just for this reward and cannot be found anywhere else! We'll also sign your box set copy of the game. Shipping included. Also Includes lower tiers rewards down to the Family Pack.

Be part of the game! An image of your choice will become part of our production art. Our artist will hand-paint your image to fit the game\u2019s art style and use it as part of the game\u2019s environment. This is our permanent token of appreciation, so that your contribution will be remembered for as long as there are players playing the game. Also Includes lower tiers rewards down to the Family Pack.

A truly personal treatment from us. We\u2019ll personally contact you to get to know you, and sculpt a 3D in-game model in honor of your contribution. This model can be a statue of you, or someone you love, or whatever strike your fancy: popcorn, chainsaw, Steve Jobs, etc. The model will be themed and styled to fit with the game, as it will be part of the game\u2019s production art assets (unless you wish otherwise). Also Includes lower tiers rewards down to the Family Pack.

Design a god! We\u2019ll create a playable character based on your ideas and include it as one of the secret unlockable characters. Tell us what god you want to include in the game (that is not already part of the game), what the god should look like, and wait to see your character comes to life. You\u2019ll also be included in the credit under \u201cAdditional Character Design\u201d. Also Includes lower tiers rewards down to the Family Pack.

With this much support from a single backer, we're assuming that you kinda like us and the game a bit more than most people, or you're ridiculously wealthy (probably both). So, we want to show you how important YOU are to us! Members of the team will send you handwritten letters to personally thank you. If you're like us, every single handwritten letters we've sent, are always sent to people that are important to us. And important people always get invited to parties! You'll be invited to our wrap party AND the after-party in Bangkok. If you decided to join us, it'd only be polite of us to also take our special guest to a nice dinner. Everyone on the team would be very excited to get to meet you. Finally, the team will prepare a personal gift for you, so that you'll remember us and back us again on our next project! Also Includes lower tiers rewards down to the Family Pack.
